Key Match Events: Grimes came off the bench to score 23 points and grab nine rebounds
Dallas closed the first half on an 11-0 scoring run to take a 55-50 lead and never trailed in the second half
Dallas out-rebounded the Lakers 44-33 and with 11 offensive rebounds managed 15 second-chance points to the Lakers' seven
Pre-Game Insights: Down by as many as six in the second quarter
Luka Doncic to a calf strain on Christmas Day
Kyrie Irving would be sidelined for some time with a lower back sprain
Post-Match Reflections: We knew we had to get back on track
Came out with the right mindset after dropping five in a row, so good to get back on track
Miscellaneous Highlights: Quentin Grimes made six of the Mavericks' 18 three-pointers
Anthony Davis scored 21 points and pulled down 12 rebounds for the Lakers
James added 18 points, 10 boards and eight assists
